column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Mind you
column2: the eggplant is $5 while my salad was $11
column3: and you pay at the counter when you order
column4: so it's not like the difference could be knocked off. The sous chef made no mention of the price difference. I figured I would give them a chance to make up the difference somehow; "here
column5: take home this bag of pastries" or something
